course_description: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming. Perfect for beginners with no prior coding experience. Build your first applications and start your coding journey.
course_overview: This course provides a comprehensive introduction to the Python programming language. You will learn core programming concepts, data structures, control flow, and functions. Through hands-on projects and exercises, you will gain the skills to write basic Python scripts and understand the principles of software development, setting a solid foundation for future learning in data science, web development, and automation.
target_audience: Absolute beginners with no prior programming experience, students, and career changers.
prerequisites: A computer capable of running Python
learning_outcomes: Explain fundamental programming concepts like variables and data types.
Apply control flow structures (if/else, loops) to solve problems.
Construct functions to organize and reuse code effectively.
Differentiate between core Python data structures (lists, dictionaries).
Create simple Python scripts to automate basic tasks.
Identify and resolve common syntax and logic errors.
